tuv.seg: • Provision of health and personal social services
• Seirbhísí sláinte agus seirbhísí sóisialta pearsanta a sholáthar
• Duty of HSE to provide services
• Dualgas FSS chun seirbhísí a sholáthar

Health and personal social services are delivered by the Health Service Executive (HSE), through medical professionals and hospitals and through a network of Local Health Offices, health centres and clinics at community level

Déanann Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte (FSS) seirbhísí sláinte agus seirbhísí sóisialta pearsanta a sheachadadh, trí ghairmithe leighis agus ospidéil agus trí líonra Oifigí Sláinte Áitiúla, ionaid agus clinicí sláinte ag leibhéal an phobail
Health services can be broadly defined as those services that are concerned with the
Is féidir seirbhísí sláinte a shainmhíniú go ginearálta mar sheirbhísí a bhaineann le
• promotion of good health
• cur chun cinn na sláinte
• prevention of illness (for example, food safety services, immunisation and vaccinations services, health screening, infant and child health services)
• breoiteacht a chosc (mar shampla, seirbhísí sábháilteachta bia, seirbhísí imdhíonachta agus vacsaínithe, scagthástáil sláinte, seirbhísí sláinte naíonán agus leanaí)
• the diagnosis and treatment of illness (for example, family doctor (GP) services, hospital services)
• diagnóis agus cóireáil breoiteachta (mar shampla, seirbhísí an dochtúra teaghlaigh (DG), seirbhísí ospidéil)

Community care and personal social services can be broadly defined as those that are designed to enable people to remain living in their communities, especially when they have difficulties doing so because of illness, disability or age

Is féidir seirbhísí cúram pobail agus seirbhísí sóisialta pearsanta a shainmhíniú go ginearálta mar sheirbhísí atá deartha chun cur ar chumas daoine maireachtáil ina bpobal féin, go háirithe nuair atá deacrachtaí acu de bharr breoiteachta, míchumais nó aoise
Examples include home nursing services, home helps, occupational therapy and social work services
Áirítear leo sin seirbhísí altranais baile, cúntóirí baile, teiripe shaothair agus seirbhísí oibre sóisialta
Provision of health and personal social services
Seirbhísí sláinte agus seirbhísí sóisialta pearsanta a sholáthar
The Integrated Services Directorate manages all hospital and community public health services
Déanann an Stiúrthóireacht Seirbhísí Comhtháite gach seirbhís ospidéil agus sláinte poiblí pobail a bhainistiú
The National Director has responsibility for the delivery of all health and personal social services across the country including hospital, primary, community and continuing care services

Tá an Stiúrthóir Náisiúnta freagrach as gach seirbhís sláinte agus phearsanta shóisialta a sholáthar ar fud na tíre, lena n-áirítear seirbhísí ospidéil, cúraim phríomhúil, pobail agus cúraim leantaigh
The range of health and personal social services provided by the HSE and its funded agencies are managed within four Regions, each with a Regional Directors of Operations

Bainistítear an réimse seirbhísí sláinte agus pearsanta sóisialta a sholáthraíonn FSS agus a ngníomhaireachtaí cistithe laistigh de cheithre Réigiún, agus tá Stiúrthóirí Réigiúnacha Oibríochtaí i ngach ceann díobh
The main function of a HSE Administrative Area is to provide or arrange for the provision of health, community care and personal social services to the people in its area
Is í príomhfheidhm an Cheantair Riaracháin FSS ná socrú nó soláthar a dhéanamh maidir le seirbhísí sláinte, cúram pobail agus sóisialta pearsanta do dhaoine sa cheantar sin

They provide many of the services directly and they arrange for the provision of other services by health professionals, private health service providers, voluntary hospitals and voluntary/community organisations

Déanann siad go leor seirbhísí a sholáthar go díreach agus déanann siad seirbhísí eile a sholáthar trí ghairmithe sláinte, soláthraithe príobháideacha na seirbhísí sláinte, ospidéil dheonacha agus eagraíochtaí deonacha/pobail
The geographic areas covered by each of the Administrative Areas are;
Is iad na ceantair gheografacha a chlúdaíonn gach Ceantar Riaracháin ná;
HSE Dublin Mid-Leinster: Dublin city south of the River Liffey, south Dublin county, Wicklow, Kildare, Longford, Westmeath, Laois, Offally
FSS Baile Átha Cliath Lár-Laighean: Cathair Bhaile Átha Cliath ó dheas d’Abhainn na Life, deisceart Chontae Bhaile Átha Cliath, Cill Mhantáin, Cill Dara, an Longfort, an Iarmhí, Laois, Uíbh Fhailí
HSE Dublin North East: Dublin City north of the River Liffey, the community of Fingal county, Louth, Meath, Cavan, Monaghan
FSS Baile Átha Cliath Thoir Thuaidh: Cathair Bhaile Átha Cliath ó thuaidh d’Abhainn na Life, pobal Contae Fhine Gall, an Lú, an Mhí, an Cabhán, Muineachán
HSE West: Limerick, Clare, Tipperary (North Riding), Galway, Mayo, Roscommon, Donegal, Sligo, Leitrim
FSS an Iarthair: Luimneach, an Clár, Tiobraid Árann (An Trian Thuaidh), Gaillimh, Maigh Eo, Ros Comáin, Dún na nGall, Sligeach, Liatroim
HSE South: Carlow, Kilkenny, Tipperary (South Riding) Waterford, Wexford, Cork, Kerry
FSS an Deiscirt: Ceatharlach, Cill Chainnigh, Tiobraid Árann (An Trian Theas) Port Láirge, Loch Garman, Corcaigh, Ciarraí
The main delivery point for community health and personal social services is through the network of 32 Local Health Offices and local health centres
An príomhphointe seachadta do sheirbhísí sláinte pobail agus sóisialta pearsanta ná tríd an líonra de 32 Oifig Sláinte Áitiúil agus ionaid sláinte áitiúla

The wide range of services that are provided through Local Health Offices and from health centres include general practitioner services, public health nursing, child health services, community welfare, chiropody, ophthalmic, speech therapy, social work, addiction counselling and treatment, physiotherapy, occupational therapy, psychiatric services and home help

I measc an raon leathan seirbhísí a sholáthraítear trí Oifigí Sláinte Áitiúla agus ó ionaid sláinte tá seirbhísí dochtúra ginearálta, altranas sláinte phobail, seirbhísí sláinte leanaí, leas pobail, cosliacht, seirbhís oftalmach, teiripe urlabhra, obair shóisialta, comhairleoireacht agus cóireáil andúile, fisiteiripe, teiripe shaothair, seirbhísí síciatracha agus cúntóir baile
Access to hospital services is through your GP/family doctor, except for Accident and Emergency services
Déantar rochtain ar sheirbhísí ospidéil trí DG/dochtúir teaghlaigh, seachas Seirbhísí Timpistí agus Éigeandála
Duty of HSE to provide services
Dualgas FSS chun seirbhísí a sholáthar
The HSE Area is obliged to provide certain services, e.g., family doctor (GP) and public hospital services
Tá dualgas ar an gCeantar FSS seirbhísí áirithe a sholáthar, m.sh., dochtúir teaghlaigh (DG) agus seirbhísí ospidéil phoiblí
There are other services that they may provide, e.g., home helps and other community care services
Tá seirbhísí eile is féidir leo a sholáthar freisin, m.sh., cúntóirí baile agus seirbhísí cúraim eile don phobal
A significant part of the HSE Area's overall budget is allocated to those services that are obligatory
Dáiltear cuid shuntasach de bhuiséad foriomlán an Cheantair FSS ar na seirbhísí sin atá éigeantach
The Health Strategy recognises that all decisions whether financial or clinical must be based on the best available evidence
Aithníonn an Straitéis Sláinte go gcaithfidh gach cinneadh, cibé ar chúrsaí airgeadais nó cliniciúla, a bheith bunaithe ar an bhfianaise is fearr atá ar fáil
Decisions will be based on:
Déanfar cinntí bunaithe ar na nithe a leanas:
• Statistical qualitative or quantitative data
• Sonraí staitistiúla go cáilíochtúil nó go cainníochtúil
• Other documented trends and behaviours
• Treochtaí agus iompraíochtaí taifeadta eile

All HSE Administrative Areas must provide service plans that usually review the previous year's spending and give a detailed breakdown of how funding provided by the HSE will be spent during the year in question

Caithfidh gach Ceantar Riaracháin FSS pleananna seirbhíse a sholáthar a dhéanann athbhreithniú go hiondúil ar chaiteachas na bliana roimhe sin agus a thugann miondealú sonraithe ar an mbealach a chaithfear maoiniú a sholáthair FSS i rith na bliana sin
The Department of Health formally sets out a statement of national priorities for health, which is then addressed by the HSE in preparing their individual service plans
Leagann an Roinn Sláinte ráiteas amach go foirmiúil maidir le tosaíochtaí náisiúnta do chúrsaí sláinte, agus tugann FSS fúthu nuair atá pleananna seirbhíse aonair á n-ullmhú acu
